#########
octo-api
#########

.. start short_desc

**Python interface to the Octopus Energy API.**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``octo-api`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install octo-api

.. end installation
